original_text: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
korean_text: 이 일을 생각할 때에 주의 사자가 현몽하여 이르되 다윗의 자손 요셉아 네 아내 마리아 데려오기를 무서워하지 말라 그에게 잉태된 자는 성령으로 된 것이라

sentences.original_text: But while he thought on these things
behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him
fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아내 마리아를 데려오기를 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: for that which is conceived in her
